title: how big a step is in league [explained]
body:
according to ryze he is 1 step ahead of cataclysm

ryze was released on feb 21 2009

world of warcraft: cataclysm was released on dec 7 2010

ryze came out exactly 654 days before cataclysm, therefore a step is 654 days long

swain is 5 steps ahead of you, that means he is 3270 days ahead, or just short of 9 years

replies.body: Your name is accurate.

REeeeee

U i leave me alone with andrei ;-;
math checks out
Quick Maffs ?
2 plus 2 is 4 minus one that's 3 quick maths

Ryze was released late in febuary 2009
Swain gets his rework early in febuary/end of january 2018,9 years later after Ryze

Coincidence?I think not.

There's a mathematics in everything.
Even in you.
Even you are mathematics.
We all are mathematics.

No it means that Swain planned to get his rework from the very beginning of the game release.
It's not uncommon to act as if something unplanned was completely planned
No it means that Swain planned to get his rework from the very beginning of the game release.
Wait Swain is getting reworked, so he could even further ahead of us. This man could be ahead of us even before we were born.
Well he's old enough...

why
Something inside of me thinks that the very internet and humanity was created to come to this conclusion. I feel like we reached pinnacle of our existence, of our purpose. What shall we become now?
Porn.  Flat out.
